column1: unite_great_britain_title;Enact The Acts of Union;Enact The Acts of Union;Enact The Acts of Union;Enact The Acts of Union;;;;;;;;;X
unite_great_britain_desc;With the final uniting of the island of Great Britain a new era for her people can begin. Under the stalwart and Protestant leadership of our Queen
column2: we shall know no fear or disunity. The Scottish regiments have already joined the English army and the first imperial profits for Scottish merchants are on their way across the Atlantic. The world has best remember the Union flag
column3: they shall be seeing a great deal more of on every continent. The kingdoms of Scotland and England are figments of the past
column4: consigned to dusty tomes. The future shall be written by the two as one!;With the final uniting of the island of Great Britain a new era for her people can begin. Under the stalwart and Protestant leadership of our Queen

construct_st_petersburg_desc;Upon the capture of the fortress Kantsy
column2: the Council of War had gathered to decide whether to further strengthen that redoubt or to look for another
column3: more convenient place for the fortress (because the above-mentioned Kantsy was too small
column4: too far from the sea and not conveniently protected by its natural surroundings). The Council resolved to look for a new place. Several days later
column5: such an appropriate place was found
column6: an island named Lust Elant (Pleasure Island)

may_constitution_desc;Recognising that the destiny of us all depends solely upon the establishment and perfection of a national Constitution
column2: having by long experience learned the inveterate faults of our government
column3: and desiring to take advantage of the season in which Europe finds itself and of this fleeting moment that has restored us to ourselves
column4: free of the ignominious dictates of foreign coercion
column9: and internal liberty of the people whose destiny is entrusted to our hands
column10: desiring as well to merit the blessing and gratitude of contemporary and future generations
column11: despite obstacles that may cause passion in us
column14: for the preservation of our country and its borders
column15: with the utmost constancy of spirit ordain the present Constitution and declare it to be entirely sacred and inviolable until the people
column16: at the time by law prescribed
column17: and by their clear will recognise a need to alter it in any of its articles. To which Constitution the further statutes of the present Sejm shall apply in everything.;Recognising that the destiny of us all depends solely upon the establishment and perfection of a national Constitution

column1: mobilzie_the_caroleans_desc;were soldiers of the Swedish kings Charles XI and Charles XII. In the late 17th and early 18th centuries
column2: in order to compensate for its lack of manpower and resources
column3: Sweden strove for innovative ways to make a more effective army. The tactics of Caroleans differed from those of Western European soldiers in their greater reliance upon pikes
column7: which helped them to be victorious
column9: in many important Swedish battles. The Carolean army is regarded as one of the most effective military forces of their time.;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: remove_russian_claims_title;Secure our position in Ingria and the Baltics;;;;;;;;;;;;X
remove_russian_claims_desc;Russia in no match for our nation
column2: their claims to the batic coast is rediculous! Let us make clear
column3: that only we have the right to dominate the baltic sea!;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column2: or a guberniya
column3: was a major and principal administrative subdivision of the Russian Empire. Selected governorates were united under an assigned governor general such as Grand Duchy of Finland
column5: Russian Turkestan and others. There also were military governors such as Kronshtadt
column8: other types of divisions were oblasts (region) and okrugs (district).;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: declere_russian_empire;Now that we own vast coast along the Baltic and the Black seas
column2: we can show our might to other great powers of europe! From now on
column3: Russia will be ruled by an Emperor!;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: absolutist_indoctrination;Prove the supiriority of an absolute monarchy;;;;;;;;;;;;X
make_confederation_desc;It is time to make Pannonia united again;;;;;;;;;;;;X
start_pest_congress_desc;With the end of the war
column2: we can see an agreement;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: hungarian_reunification_desc;Hungarian seim decided to give Austrian king crown of Hungary;;;;;;;;;;;;X
end_transylvanian_inpedendance_desc;We need to place governors from Viena to rule the region;;;;;;;;;;;;X
disable_council_desc;Delete all council decisions and events from game for this playthrough;;;;;;;;;;;;X
set_prime_minister_desc;Estates start the mindgame to decide who will got the prime minister case;;;;;;;;;;;;X
order_to_siebenburger_desc;Rights to own Siebenburgen are presented in the every class or sitizen of Austria. As Bohemia and Hungary
column2: Transylvania is one of the parts of Habsburg empire;;;;;;;;;;;;X
Civil Code drafted under Maria Theresia
column3: 1753-1766 compiled by the "Compilationskommission" commission; represents a major step in preparation for the Allgemeines Burgerliches Gesetzbuch;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: constitutio_criminalis_theresiana_desc;Constitutio Criminalis Theresiana—the Criminal Code of Maria Theresia
column2: Archduchess of Austria
column3: promulgated in 1768
column4: five years after the publication of Voltaire's famous essay “Essay on Toleration” (1763) where Voltaire objected to the “legally sufficient indications” of guilt that were allowed judges to proceed with judicial torture to extract a confession. The Theresiana was meant to introduce uniform criminal law and procedure throughout the Habsburg Crown Lands and remained in effect until the reforms of Emperor Joseph II in 1787. To that end
column5: it included a series of appendices
column6: which showed how judicial torture should properly be applied. (The law did not apply in Hungary);;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: vaccination_mar_desc;Empress Maria Theresa was a strong supporter of inoculation against smallpox
column2: which at her time was one of the most dangerous diseases. The disease claimed several victims in her own family;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: establish_theresian_military_academy_desc;The Theresian Military Academy (known as the Theresianum) is one of the oldest military academies in the world (the oldest is the Military Academy of Modena). It was founded on 14 December 1751 by Maria Theresa of Austria
column2: who gave the first commander of the Academy
column3: Field marshal Leopold Joseph von Daun (Count Daun)
column4: the order Mach er mir tuchtige Officier und rechtschaffene Manner daraus ("Make me hard working officers and honest men");;;;;;;;;;;;X

column2: ending press censorship and limiting the power of the Catholic Church. And with his Edict of Toleration
column3: Joseph gave minority religions
column6: the ability to live and worship more freely;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column2: Joseph had surrounded himself with reform-hungry advisors and the young court of Vienna was ambitious in the elaboration of innovative plans. He was described as a "forward-looking ruler". The large number of privy councillors was reduced and attempts were made to make the bureaucracy more efficient;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: financial_reform_joseph_title;Financial Reform of Joseph the I;;;;;;;;;;;;X
financial_reform_joseph_desc;Measures were taken to modernize the central bodies and a certain success was achieved in stabilizing the chronic Habsburg finances;;;;;;;;;;;;X
charles_vi_court_desc;Charles was extremely discontented at the loss of Spain
column2: and as a result
column3: he mimicked the staid Spanish Habsburg court ceremonial
column4: adopting the dress of a Spanish monarch
column6: according to British historian Edward Crankshaw
column7: consisted of "a black doublet and hose

column1: ambitions_in_bavaria_desc;Joseph negotiated a secret agreement with Charles Theodore shortly after Max Joseph's death. In this agreement
column2: Charles Theodore ceded Lower Bavaria to Austria in exchange for uncontested succession to the remainder of the duchy. Charles Theodore also hoped to acquire from Joseph some unencumbered parts of the Austrian Netherlands and parts of Further Austria that he could bequeath to his bastards
column3: but this was not written into the agreement and Joseph was not a particularly generous man;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column2: the Cossacks of Right-bank Ukraine
column3: under the leadership of hetman Semen Paliy
column5: which after early successes was defeated. Mazepa convinced Russian Tsar Peter I to allow him to intervene
column7: taking over major portions of Right-bank Ukraine
column8: while Poland was weakened by an invasion of Swedish king Charles XII;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: subsidize_cossak_rebellions_desc;In 1699 a new Polish king Augustus II disbanded the Cossack militia and signed a peace treaty with Ottoman Turkey. Cossacks were angered by this situation
column2: and in 1702 Paliy started an open rebellion against the crown
column3: the last of the major Cossack uprisings against the Commonwealth. Together with a number of other Cossack polkovnyks
column4: Paliy and his rebels captured Bila Tserkva
column6: Nemirov and a few other towns;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: masepa_revolt_desc;The last straw in the souring relations with Tsar Peter was his refusal to commit any significant force to defend Ukraine against the Polish King Stanislaus Leszczynski
column2: an ally of Charles XII of Sweden
column3: who threatened to attack the Cossack Hetmanate in 1708. Peter expected that king Charles of Sweden was going to attack and thought that he could spare no forces. In the opinion of Mazepa
column4: this blatantly violated the Treaty of Pereyaslav
column5: since Russia refused to protect Ukraine's territory and left it to fare on its own;;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: claim_crimea_south_ukrine_desc;Wild fields is a geographical term for south Ukranian lands. They are not too densly populated nor valuable
column2: but that can change. If we were able to take them for ouselves
column3: we can begin colonizing these lands and later profit from bigged taxes. Not to meniton the bigger sea access.;x

column1: conquer_east_prussia_desc;conquering more ports on the baltic is in Russian's best strategic intrest. Although we secured ports in ingria and livonia
column2: Koningsberg can be another lunchpod for Russia to spread it's influence not only on the euro-asian plain
column3: but also the world.;x

column1: invite_germans_to_southern_border_desc;With our recent conquests of the wild fields we should begin setteling the lands. Along side our native russians
column2: we should invite the germans
column3: just like many nations did in XII and XIII centurys. On special laws they would be able to build their own settlments and in a few years we will finally be able to collect more taxation which will enrich us greatly.;x

column1: introduce_proper_consciption_desc;Conscription of young Russian men for lifetime service began in 1699 during the rule of Peter the Great. The goal was to establish a standing army and increase its size for the emperor's many military campaigns.Conscription significantly differed for the wealthy and the lower classes. Each nobleman had to serve in the military
column2: but city dwellers and peasants
column3: who unlike the aristocracy paid a direct poll tax
column4: faced a specific form of recruitment. The local commune selected only some men between 20 and 35 years old who would spend the rest of their lives in the army.;x

column1: vaccination_cat_desc;Catherine the Great of Russia was inoculated against smallpox by physician Thomas Dimsdale
column2: with relays of horses at the ready in case the inoculation should go wrong and Dimsdale need to escape from Catherine's angry subjects. The operation was kept secret
column3: and Catherine recovered successfully. This poses an opportunity to encourage vaccination all across the country;x

column1: settle_alaska_desc;With our Siberian colonies already going all the way to the Pacific ocean and the recent discovery of new american lands perhaps we should
column2: just like the other empires
column3: establish a colony of our own and finally set foot in the new world?;x

column1: louis_dream_desc;Louis ambition had always been grand from the beginning. He always argued that France's borders are ought to be consolidated and one of their mos vounreable points was in the north west. Louis always wanted to extend the French border gar to the boundires set by th Rhine river. Now we are finally in a position to do so
column2: with our new territory in the lower netherlands we will send a proclamation about our natural borders and rightfull claims to them. Those realms that stand in our way
column3: can eiter plege their loyalty to us or prepare to meet the wrath of almitghty french army;x

column1: form_french_rhineland_desc;As glorious as our conquest in the rhine are
column2: we can't simply annex this terrtory. Setting up a loyal duchy is a good step forward
column3: and it may pay the wave for it's future incorporation to the French crown. In the mean time the will bring french settlers to the rhine and set up a proper administrative system there;x

column1: annex_rhineland_desc;The time has come for the incorporation of our rhenish dutchy to the french kingodom.;x
southern_border_desc;Our borders are increadibly vounreable! The situation in Italy is perfect for us to nudge the borders in direction of Turin
column2: ever closer to the ideal borders. It is in our best intrest and duty to expand when we can and push others further away from our core lands.;x

column1: form_rhine_ger_desc;Our French overlords are weak and they can't renforce the french elites present in this duchy. Let us
column2: Germans take the rightfull spot in this realm;x

column1: frh_rhine_desc;Let us claim our rightfull region. For the glory of France;x
